product_name: Brooks Versatile Sleeveless T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for warm weather, the Brooks Versatile Sleeveless T-shirt transitions from training to race day without skipping a beat. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester offers soft stretch, top-notch performance and high mobility. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for warm weather, the Brooks Versatile Sleeveless T-shirt transitions from training to race day without skipping a beat.
